items.title: Blush Scallop Ring Dish
items.body_html: This pink scallop ring dish is a must-have accessory for any stylish home! The delicate design will add a subtle romantic touch to any decor, making it the perfect place to store your rings, trinkets, and special treasures. Adorbs!!

feature_image.alt: Blush Scalloped Dish in lifestyle setting

hover_image.alt: Blush Scalloped Dish with rings

items.title: Your Not Forever Home
items.body_html:
Our homes have always been our castles, but today they need to be so much more than simply a roof over our heads. Home offices, workout studios, entertaining spaces, mental health sanctuaries and centres for self-care… the demands on our four walls are unprecedented. And now many more of us are renting than ever before – but that doesn’t mean we can’t make our homes into living environments that reflect our unique sense of style and bring joy to our everyday lives.

In Your Not Forever Home, Katherine Ormerod has curated a range of projects for every room in a rented house or flat, guiding you through techniques and invaluable insights that will help create spaces tailored to your taste.

feature_image.alt: book cover with photo of bed with "YOUR NOT FOREVER HOME" written over it in pink

items.title: Birth Month Mini Embroidered Journal - June
items.body_html:
A mini hardcover journal, embroidered with a pink rose, the traditional June birth flower. Inside, find 240 blank pages and a ribbon bookmark.

  • Book cloth cover with ivory uncoated paper
  • Floral embroidered cover with gold foil accents
  • Natural white text paper
  • Grosgrain ribbon bookmark
  • 4.25" W × 6.25" L
  • 240 unlined pages
  • Imported

feature_image.alt: dark green journal with pink rose embroidered on it

items.title: Wildflower Petite Glass Jar Candle
items.body_html:
Notes of Native Wildflowers, Golden Poppy, Springing Herbs & Soft Citrus

You've been called to dance among the wildflowers, losing yourself in the beauty of this unruly floral sea. Lightly pass your hand over a kaleidoscope of Native Wildflowers, blooming Golden Poppy, Ambrosia and springing Herbs; sugared by misty vapors of Blue Agave and delicately kissed by the rising Citron sun. Gently coax this fragrant super bloom of Voluspa's Wildflowers.

A surprising hint of decor for any space, the Petite Jar Candle is small yet eye-catching with glass embossed in the Maison Collection pattern. A metallic decorative lid can be used to extinguish the flame or keep the candle dust-free when not in use. This candle makes the perfect travel companion or thoughtful gift.

Burn Time: ~ 40 Hours
Fill: 4.5 oz.

Free of Phthalates, Pesticides, Paragons, and Sulfates

feature_image.alt: White glass jar with colorful metallic lid. Wildflowers Voluspa Candle.

hover_image.alt: Wildflower Petite Jar Candle on white background

items.title: Coconut Rose Shower Steamer
items.body_html:
We've updated our steamer packaging! Each steamer is now wrapped in biodegradable film to prevent crumbs and to help retain their scent for as long as possible. Now buyers can stock up on these spa bombs to use immediately or save them for a rainy day.

Available in many of the same scents you know and love, customers can mix & match their favorite 2.5-3oz steamers to easily match any mood. We also created a new mold allowing the user to break the steamer in half. Each half lasts at least 2 showers creating a minimum of 4 blissful showers per box.

Blend: coconut, candy apple, raspberry, red currant, tulip, freesia, heliotrope, rose, cashmere musk, vanilla, and amber

feature_image.alt: light pink shower steamer that says 'coconut rose' on it

items.body_html:
Gentle, reusable press-on nails. Quick easy application and removal. A modern press-on nail from the authority in modern self-care. Chill Tips are salon-quality nail art that you can do in your Chillhome, with no mess, no wait time, and no smudges so you have more me-time. 

The kit includes: 24 nails to find your perfect fit Dual-sided buffer and file Cuticle stick Non-toxic glue

Made in United States

items.title: Mango Sorbet Body Polish
items.body_html:
This mouth-watering combination is like a fruit salad for your senses. Ripe mango, juicy lemons, and fresh raspberries evoke the fun and liveliness of the tropics. 

Say goodbye to dry, itchy skin. Made with pure cane sugar and super-fine salt, this signature formulation provides a gentle, yet invigorating exfoliation. Moisturize and hydrate as you rinse off and experience the 3-in-1 scrub-to-lotion effect.  A rich blend of butters and oils are released, that leave your skin silky soft and smooth. 

Ingredients:

Sodium chloride (fine grain salt), Sucrose (pure cane sugar), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Persea Gratissima Oil and Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil (Avocado Butter),  Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia Nut) Seed Oil, Tocoperol Acetate (Gluten Free Vitamin E) Net Wt 8 oz

feature_image.alt: White background with pink bag in the center. The words body polish are written down the sides in white lettering.

hover_image.alt: Sand with close up shot of pink body polish bag with water droplets on it

items.title: Hibiscus Rose Herbal Tea Sachet
items.body_html:
Our individually-wrapped tea bags (tea pyramid sachets) are perfect for single-serve settings like hotel rooms, cafes, coffee shops, restaurant tea service, spas and wellness centers, and more. Let your customers enjoy a delicious cup of premium tea at a self-serve station or complete your perfect gift box or basket with some of our individually-wrapped tea bags.

Each tea bag is approximately 3.6" wide and 4" tall. The outer bag material is recyclable, and the tea pyramid bag is biodegradable. This product is packaged in bags in increments of 50. 

HIBISCUS ROSE (CAFFEINE-FREE): Stop and smell the roses. Enjoy the simple--yet beautiful--things in life.

items.title: Strawberry Mule Drink Mix
items.body_html:
Tired of unhealthy, overly sugary mixers? We were too! Don’t know how to make cocktails on your own? We didn’t either! And that’s exactly why we created Craftmix! Strawberry, ginger, and lime? This flavor tastes like a mule-million bucks!

Add your favorite Alcohol or make it a Mocktail!

1 Packet = 1 Drink

Be Your Own Bartender: Craftmix was specifically designed for people on the go! We’ve seen our customers enjoy Craftmix cocktail kits in so many different places including: Camping, festivals, concerts, airplanes, house parties, bars (Shh! Don’t tell the bartender!), picnics, pool parties, tailgates, and more!

With Craftmix you can now bring the party with you! No Health Shame! Our products are made with all natural ingredients and are low sugar, low calorie, gluten free, soy free, vegan, fat free, cholesterol free, dairy free, non GMO, and made in the USA

Directions: Start with one shot of liquor, add two shots of sparkling water, mix in a Craftmix Packet, and serve over ice!

feature_image.alt: Packet of Craftmix Strawberry Mule being poured into copper Moscow mule mug with strawberry and mint garnish.

items.title: Red Lobster Cracker
items.body_html: • NANTUCKET SEAFOOD'S RED LOBSTER CRACKER is the most fitting tool for the job, the seafood cracker features a fun lobster claw design in fire engine red, making it perfect for any seafood extravaganza • CONSTRUCTED OF STRONG DURABLE CAST ALUMINUM the seafood shell cracker is tough enough to open crab legs, lobster tails, and other seafood; Lobster claw cracker measures 5.25 x 2.25 x 0.25 inch • EASY TO STORE SEAFOOD CRACKER is compact to avoid clutter in your kitchen utensil and gadgets drawer; this festive cracker will ensure you can retrieve all the goodness inside those crab legs, lobster tails and oyster shells • DOUBLES AS A NUTCRACKER - use to crack open your favorite nuts like chestnuts, walnuts and pecans; use this cracker alone or pair with other utensils such as picks, fish forks, or scissors. • CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Easy to clean, simply hand wash and towel dry after your lobster boil, crab fest or clam bake!Package Type: Blister Card

items.title: Lobster Bag Charm
items.body_html: Bring the nautical aesthetic everywhere with our Lobster Bag Charm! Featuring a mini bright red carabiner for easy attachment, a light blue cord tassel with soft silicone tips, and our handcrafted, cream and red lobster charm that captures the essence of nautical days, this keychain bag charm adds a bright, fun touch to any bag or accessory. The red oval carabiner ensures secure and effortless attachment to totes, backpacks, handbags, or keychains. Lightweight yet durable, it’s the perfect accessory for summer lovers, travelers, or anyone dreaming of their next nautical escape.

items.title: Hot Honey Marinara
items.body_html:
An excitingly bold fan-favorite. Light and sweet with a perfect touch of spice. We use chili flakes grown right here in California. Packed with flavorful heat, they're the perfect partner to the sweetness of our honey. Light, sweet aftertaste. Not too spicy.   

• Made in United States

• Ingredients: Diced Tomatoes, Tomato Puree, Yellow Onion, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Honey, Water, Tomato Paste, Garlic, Contains 2% or Less Of: Sea Salt, Red Wine Vinegar, Red Pepper, Black Pepper, Oregano.

• Shelf life: 12–24 months

• Storage: Shelf-stable

•Weight: 1.44 lb (0.65 kg)

feature_image.alt: A jar of SAUZ Hot Honey Marinara sauce labeled as 'Sweet & Spicy Tomato Sauce,' positioned on a wooden surface. A honey dipper drips honey onto the top of the jar. To the left, there is a small glass jar filled with red chili flakes and oil. To the right of the jar, a ripe tomato, a piece of garlic, and a slice of onion are arranged, all against a warm, wood-grain background

hover_image.alt: An ingredient list for 'Hot Honey Arrabbiata' sauce displayed visually with labeled ingredients. Ingredients shown include diced tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, olive oil, red wine vinegar, a yellow onion, garlic, red pepper flakes, oregano, salt, pepper, and honey. A line reads, 'Yep, that's it.' The background is light-colored and simple.

items.title: Spicy Garlic Mohawk Pasta
items.body_html:
This is one of our favorite and most unique pastas—and it’s got some kick. Made with cayenne pepper, smoked paprika and granulated garlic, this pasta adds a new layer to dishes like mac & cheese or baked pasta. Generously spiced but not eye-watering, this pasta will turn up the heat on your dish.

Ingredients: Semolina Flour, Granulated Garlic, Cayenne Pepper, Smoked Paprika, Water

Vegan | 12 oz. Bag

feature_image.alt: A boxed pasta product labeled "Scratch Pasta Co" in red packaging. The flavor is "Spicy Garlic Mohawks," featuring a small window displaying the uniquely shaped pasta inside. The packaging mentions that it is handcrafted and made with garlic and spices, weighing 12 ounces (430g).

hover_image.alt: A close-up view of uniquely shaped pasta pieces in a vibrant reddish-brown color. The pasta features a curved design with ridges and frilly edges, resembling small mohawks.

items.title: Bitter Orange Cherry Spritz Mixer
items.body_html:
Introducing the Mixly Bitter Orange Cherry Spritz Mixer, a fresh blend perfect for daydreamers that'll whisk you away to a sun-drenched terrace on the Italian coast with every sip.

Each bottle captures the essence of a classic Italian spritz, harmonizing the vibrant flavors of bitter orange and cherry. Crafted from all-natural ingredients like fresh citrus, real fruit juices, and a touch of honey, this non-alcoholic spritz mixer makes it easy to craft the perfect summer cocktail.

Each 250ml bottle is designed to create 5-6, 5oz spritz cocktails.

feature_image.alt: colorful bitter orange cherry mixer bottle with designs on it

hover_image.alt: colorful bitter orange cherry mixer bottle with designs on it

items.title: Brushfire Farms Original Pepper Jam
items.body_html:
Brushfire Farms Ol’ Tejano Chile Pequin Jam embodies the true flavors of South Texas. With a little more heat than your standard pepper jam, our Pequin peppers provide a unique smoky heat that goes well with just about anything! Use it sparingly as a spicy glaze for grilled meats or seafood. Mix it into cream cheese for a zesty spread, or add a kick to your morning routine by pairing it with eggs or breakfast burritos. Incorporate it into stir-fries or marinades for a spicy twist. Remember, a little goes a long way, so experiment to find the perfect balance of heat and flavor in your dishes.

Pro Tip: Pour it over cream cheese and eat with crackers or add to your favorite Charcuterie board!

• Weight: 1.09 lb (496.12 g)

feature_image.alt: Jam jar with cactus and flames on a pink label in the center
